snippet.title: Railroad Corporation - Gameplay Reveal (Available May 27th)
snippet.description:
Railroad Corporation is out now! Buy on Steam now: http://bit.ly/2G62083
Relive the pioneering spirit of the Golden Age of Steam, by establishing your own railroad empire across 19th Century North America. Build the lines, buy the rolling stock and prosper in the cities you connect - compete against other railroad tycoons and work your way to the top.

Keep up to date with Railroad Corporation and Iceberg Interactive:

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/RailroadCorporation
https://www.facebook.com/IcebergInteractive

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/CorbieGames
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/RailroadCorporation
Discord: http://bit.ly/RailroadCorpDiscord
Official website: http://www.railroadcorporation.com
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
